timeline.message: Update javadoc of rerouteTo()/forwardTo() to clear out the difference between the two

timeline.bodyText: It would be good to replace also the word reroute to forward for consistency.
timeline.author: bogdanudrescu

timeline.bodyText: Same here reroute can be changed to forward.
